intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to the privacy policy of the Punchlines application. We place great importance on the protection of your personal data.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.content: Our application only collects information that you provide during the initial onboarding:
dataCollected.note: No personally identifiable information is collected without your explicit consent.

dataUse.title: Use of Data
dataUse.content: All collected data is anonymized and used exclusively for:
items: Personalizing content according to your preferences
Analyzing overall app usage for improvement purposes
Bug tracking and app performance monitoring

analytics.title: Analytics and Monitoring Tools
analytics.content: We use the following third-party services to help us improve our application and understand how it is used:
analytics.mixpanel: Used for product analytics and user behavior tracking. All data is anonymized and helps us understand how our app is used to improve the user experience.
analytics.sentry: Monitors app performance and collects crash reports to help us identify and fix technical issues. No personal information is included in these reports.
analytics.appsflyer: Provides marketing analytics and attribution data to help us understand the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. Data collected is anonymized and used for marketing optimization.
analytics.note: These services adhere to strict data protection standards and process data in accordance with applicable privacy laws. The data collected is anonymized and used solely for the purposes mentioned above.

storage.title: Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is securely stored on Supabase servers, with security protocols that comply with industry standards. Data is anonymized before any analytical processing.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, exchange, or transfer your anonymized information to third parties, except in the following cases:
items: When necessary to provide a service you have requested

purchases.title: In-App Purchases
purchases.content: If you make in-app purchases via RevenueCat, please note that we only have access to transaction data, not your payment information.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access the data we hold about you
Request rectification or deletion of this data
Object to the processing of your data
Withdraw your consent at any time

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. The changes will take effect as soon as they are published in the application or on our website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your personal data, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the Punchlines application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the application.

use.title: Use of the Application
use.content: You agree to use the Punchlines application only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. It is prohibited to use the application in a way that could damage, disable, or overload the application.

content.title: User Content
content.content: By creating your own punchlines or affirmations, you retain all rights to your content, but you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display this content as part of the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: If you create an account on the application, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

purchases.title: In-App Purchases
purchases.content: All purchases made in the application are processed by the respective platforms (Apple App Store or Google Play Store) and are subject to their terms and conditions.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The application is provided "as is," without warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee that the application will be error-free or continuously available.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. The changes will take effect as soon as they are published in the application or on our website.

contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of use, please contact us at:
